name: INSearchForNotebookItemsIntentHandling
desc: The handler interface for searching for notes, tasks, and reminders.

items.name: func resolveItemType(for: INSearchForNotebookItemsIntent, with: (INNotebookItemTypeResolutionResult) -> Void)
items.desc: Resolves the type of items to search.

items.name: func resolveTitle(for: INSearchForNotebookItemsIntent, with: (INSpeakableStringResolutionResult) -> Void)
items.desc: Resolves the string to use when searching the title of notes, tasks, or reminders.

items.name: func resolveContent(for: INSearchForNotebookItemsIntent, with: (INStringResolutionResult) -> Void)
items.desc: Resolves the string to use when searching the content of notes.

items.name: func resolveStatus(for: INSearchForNotebookItemsIntent, with: (INTaskStatusResolutionResult) -> Void)
items.desc: Resolves the status value to use during the search.

items.name: func resolveDateSearchType(for: INSearchForNotebookItemsIntent, with: (INDateSearchTypeResolutionResult) -> Void)
items.desc: Resolves how to use a date value during the search.

items.name: func resolveDateTime(for: INSearchForNotebookItemsIntent, with: (INDateComponentsRangeResolutionResult) -> Void)
items.desc: Resolves the date to use during a date-based search.

items.name: func resolveLocation(for: INSearchForNotebookItemsIntent, with: (INPlacemarkResolutionResult) -> Void)
items.desc: Resolves how to use a location value during the search.

items.name: func resolveLocationSearchType(for: INSearchForNotebookItemsIntent, with: (INLocationSearchTypeResolutionResult) -> Void)
items.desc: Resolves the location to use during a location-based search.

items.name: func resolveTaskPriority(for: INSearchForNotebookItemsIntent, with: (INTaskPriorityResolutionResult) -> Void)
items.desc: Resolves the priority to use during a priority-based search.

items.name: func resolveTemporalEventTriggerTypes(for: INSearchForNotebookItemsIntent, with: (INTemporalEventTriggerTypeOptionsResolutionResult) -> Void)
items.desc: Resolves the trigger type to use during a temporal-based search.

items.name: func confirm(intent: INSearchForNotebookItemsIntent, completion: (INSearchForNotebookItemsIntentResponse) -> Void)
items.desc: Confirms whether you can perform the search.

items.name: func handle(intent: INSearchForNotebookItemsIntent, completion: (INSearchForNotebookItemsIntentResponse) -> Void)
items.desc: Performs the search and deliver the results to SiriKit.
